00013 #define _compare( _x_ )                                                       \
00014   OrderContext oc = vtx.m_orderContext;                                       \
00015   vtx.setOrderContext(m_orderContext);                                        \
00016   bool flag(false);                                                           \
00017   switch ( m_orderContext )                                                   \
00018     {                                                                         \
00019     case PTSUM2:                                                              \
00020       flag = m_ptSum2 _x_ vtx.m_ptSum2;                                       \
00021       break;                                                                  \
00022     case PTSUM:                                                               \
00023       flag = m_ptSum _x_ vtx.m_ptSum;                                         \
00024       break;                                                                  \
00025     case PTSUM2CHARGED:                                                       \
00026       flag = m_ptSum2Charged _x_ vtx.m_ptSum2Charged;                         \
00027       break;                                                                  \
00028     case PTSUMCHARGED:                                                        \
00029       flag = m_ptSumCharged _x_ vtx.m_ptSumCharged;                           \
00030       break;                                                                  \
00031     case PTSUM2NEUTRAL:                                                       \
00032       flag = m_ptSum2-m_ptSum2Charged _x_ vtx.m_ptSum2-vtx.m_ptSum2Charged;   \
00033       break;                                                                  \
00034     case PTSUMNEUTRAL:                                                        \
00035       flag = m_ptSum-m_ptSumCharged _x_ vtx.m_ptSum-vtx.m_ptSumCharged;       \
00036       break;                                                                  \
00037     default:                                                                  \
00038       break;                                                                  \
00039     }                                                                         \
00040   vtx.setOrderContext(oc);                            \
00041   return flag

00053 class Vertex
00054 {
00055 public:
00056 
00063   enum InteractionType { PILEUP  = 0x01,
00064              SIGNAL  = 0x02,
00065              MIXED   = 0x03,
00066              UNKNOWN = 0x00 };
00068   enum Type { NEUTRAL = 0,
00069           CHARGED = 1, 
00070           TOTAL   = 0 };
00072   enum OrderContext { PTSUM = 0,
00073               PTSUM2 = 1,
00074               PTSUMCHARGED = 2,
00075               PTSUM2CHARGED = 3,
00076               PTSUMNEUTRAL = 4,
00077               PTSUM2NEUTRAL = 5 };

00208 inline void Vertex::setOrderContext(OrderContext oc)
00209 { m_orderContext = oc; }
00210 inline void Vertex::setOrderContext(OrderContext oc) const
00211 { m_orderContext = oc; }
00212 inline Vertex::OrderContext Vertex::orderContext() const
00213 { return m_orderContext; }
00214 
00215 inline bool Vertex::operator==(const Vertex& vtx) const
00216 { return m_id == vtx.id(); }
00217 inline bool Vertex::operator!=(const Vertex& vtx) const
00218 { return m_id != vtx.id(); }

00334 struct Converters
00335 {
00372   template<class T>
00373   static int convertToPJ(const T& dataSource,int index,int vtx,
00374              Vertex::InteractionType type,
00375              fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet)
00376   {
00377     pJet.reset(fastjet::PtYPhiM(dataSource.Pt[index],
00378                 dataSource.Rap[index],
00379                 dataSource.Phi[index],
00380                 dataSource.Pm[index]));
00381     pJet.set_user_info(new ParticleInfo(dataSource.ID[index],
00382                     dataSource.Charge[index],
00383                     vtx,type));
00384     return 1;
00385   }
00398   template<class T>
00399   static int convertToPJ(const T& dataSource,int findex,int lindex,int vtx,
00400              Vertex::InteractionType type,
00401              std::vector<fastjet::PseudoJet>& vJet)
00402   {
00403     vJet.clear();
00404     for ( int i=findex;i<lindex;++i )
00405       {
00406     vJet.push_back(fastjet::PseudoJet(0.,0.,0.,0.));
00407     convertToPJ(dataSource,i,vtx,type,vJet.back());
00408       }
00409     return (int)vJet.size();
00410   }
00412 };

00564   static void setOrderContext(std::vector<Vertex>& vertices,
00565                   Vertex::OrderContext oc=Vertex::PTSUM2)
00566   {
00567     std::vector<Vertex>::iterator fVtx(vertices.begin());
00568     std::vector<Vertex>::iterator lVtx(vertices.end());
00569     for ( ; fVtx != lVtx; ++fVtx ) { fVtx->setOrderContext(oc); }
00570   }
00571 
00580   static void sortVtx(std::vector<Vertex>& vertices,
00581               Vertex::OrderContext oc=Vertex::PTSUM2)
00582   { setOrderContext(vertices,oc);
00583     std::sort(vertices.begin(),vertices.end()); }
00584 };

00929 inline 
00930 const std::vector<Vertex>& Event::vertices() const
00931 { return m_vertices; }
00932 
00933 inline
00934 bool Event::vtxIndex(int vtxId,size_t& idx) const
00935 { 
00936   std::vector<Vertex>::iterator fVtx(m_vertices.begin());
00937   std::vector<Vertex>::iterator lVtx(m_vertices.end());
00938   idx = 0;
00939   while ( fVtx != lVtx && vtxId != fVtx->id() ) { ++fVtx; ++idx; }
00940   return fVtx != lVtx; 
00941 }
00942 
00943 inline void Event::setParent(Event* parent)
00944 { m_parent = parent; }
00945 
00946 inline Event* Event::parent()
00947 { return m_parent; }

00949 inline
00950 bool Features::isCharged(const fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet)
00951 { return pJet.has_user_info<ParticleInfo>() ?
00952     pJet.user_info<ParticleInfo>().charge() != 0. : false; }
00953 
00954 inline 
00955 bool Features::isNeutral(const fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet)
00956 { return pJet.has_user_info<ParticleInfo>() ?
00957     pJet.user_info<ParticleInfo>().charge() == 0. : false; }
00958 
00959 inline
00960 bool Features::hasInteractionType(const fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet,
00961                   Vertex::InteractionType type)
00962 { return pJet.has_user_info<ParticleInfo>() ? 
00963     (pJet.user_info<ParticleInfo>().interactionType() & type) == type : 
00964     false; }
00965 
00966 inline
00967 int Features::vertexId(const fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet)
00968 { return pJet.has_user_info<ParticleInfo>() ?
00969     pJet.user_info<ParticleInfo>().vertexId() : -1; }
00970 
00971 inline
00972 int Features::particleId(const fastjet::PseudoJet& pJet)
00973 { return pJet.has_user_info<ParticleInfo>() ?
00974     pJet.user_info<ParticleInfo>().id() : 0 ; }
